title: A charming and brilliant feel good film.
review: A very good movie with a lot of heart and laughs that will keep you entertained for the whole movie.

title: Stylishly directed and thematically rich.
review: I've seen it 3 or 4 times, and it still gives me butterflies. I love the quiet conversations and sexual tension between them. The soundtrack track is one of my favorite of all time. The songs give these action-packed moments even more feeling and dept.
